Properties

DebugEventRoot

The root directory where the Abatab debug logs are stored.

Declaration
public string DebugEventRoot { get; set; }
Property Value
Type Description
System.String

Default value is logs\debug
Remarks
  • At runtime the DebugEventRoot value is created as a sub-directory of the AbatabDataRoot.
Examples
  • If AbatabDataRoot=C:\Abatab\LIVE, and DebugEventRoot=logs\debug, then DebugEventRoot would be set to C:\Abatab\LIVE\logs\debug at runtime.

DebugMode

The debug mode that Abatab will use when executed.

Declaration
public string DebugMode { get; set; }
Property Value
Type Description
System.String

Default value is disabled
Remarks

SettingDescription
disabledDebugging functionality is disabled.
enabledDebugging functionality is enabled.

  • Debug mode can have a significant impact on performance, and should not be enabled in production environments.
